here is message from Razor buddies:
This is the first day that we have been working on Assassin's Creed 2 and in this time we have achieved alot. We have bypassed the Ubisoft Launcher and you won't have to keep entering the cd key again and again. Even if you disconnect from the internet, the game will continue. And about the savegames; The Ubisoft server has only started working on March 5th. Only then we have been able to find out where the trigger files go to, their format and other vital information needed to make a working crack. A crack should be released the 5th, 6th or in the worst case scenario, the 7th of March.

Hi - just worked out how to get these save files working.

If you monitor your save folder while you are loading the game you will see that the game is downloading new saves off it's server and using them to start you at the beginning.

I just disconnected my internet just after i clic load my saves and hey presto you will have access to the saves provided in this torrent and be able to get past the animus.

Make sure you delete everything in the ' 4 ' folder first and then place his four save files in there.

I also wasn't sure if the ' Assassin2.ini ' is storing any game progress - so i deleted that as well before i load the game just to be sure.

This file is located at 

My Computer / C Drive (main hard drive) / Documents and Settings / Your Name? / Application Data / Ubisoft / Assassin's Creed 2

All worked for me and at least you can get a good idea of the gameplay.  Doesn't seem to be any way to save your progress though and so a lttle experimentation may be needed (maybe reconnect the internet while in game and see if you can make a new online save?)

God - there making this game so ruddy complicated to play - LOL.

Last comment - i promise.

Just tried it again and it definetely works - you will have to clear out your save folder and plonk in the 4 saves from this torrent every time you start a new game but at least we can play it for now untill a proper crack comes along.

Don't forget - you only disconnect your internet connection when it starts saying ' sychronizing saved games' - it will then say failed to load or something but you can still clic play and load the saves in your save folder.

HAVE FUN!

You don't have to place the saves every time you want to play.
You can just click the gear icon at the left of the minimize icon in the Ubisoft Loader, so it stops synchronizing your save with the server. If you do this, you can even save your progress using this savegame, but you can't go into missions. Remember: if you accept a mission, the screen goes white, and you can only see the HUD.

well there is another way to make saves work and does not require to unplug your cable....in top right corner near minimize button there's a hexagram star click it and it will ask you if you want to disable online saving bla bla bla click yes and restart launcher it should work after that w'o problems
